title: AR-Based Mathematics STEM Education Design: Electronic Kit Exploration Project

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Electrical Circuit Concepts and Ability to Interpret Quadratic Function Graphs
context.additional_context: Hands-on environment combining physical electronic kit manipulation with mathematical modeling using AR technology

learning_goals: Learners can model the voltage-current relationship in electronic circuits as a quadratic function using AR simulations.
Learners can quantify and analyze resistance changes in LDRs (light-dependent resistors) using trigonometric function graphs.
Using AR electronic kits, learners can represent capacitor charge-discharge curves as differential equation graphs.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
